member.name: T:Metrics.ElasticSearch.RollingIndexType
member.summary: Manipulates the Elastic to be broken into partitions for maintenance purposes

member.name: F:Metrics.ElasticSearch.RollingIndexType.None
member.summary: the Elastic Index would be the same as provided to Config

member.name: F:Metrics.ElasticSearch.RollingIndexType.Daily
member.summary: the Elastic Index would be the INDEX-yyyy-MM-dd, use this to be able to delete Index by day for maintenance purposes

member.name: F:Metrics.ElasticSearch.RollingIndexType.Monthly
member.summary: the Elastic Index would be the INDEX-yyyy-MM, use this to be able to delete Index by month for maintenance purposes

member.name: T:Metrics.ElasticSearch.ElasticReportsConfig
member.summary: Configuration for using the elastic (elastic search) reporting

member.name: P:Metrics.ElasticSearch.ElasticReportsConfig.RollingIndexType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the rolling index.
member.value: The type of the rolling index.

member.name: P:Metrics.ElasticSearch.ElasticReportsConfig.ReportingApplication
member.summary: optional, provide this interface to be reflected on the health checks document reports
